alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 7:25PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Teton and northeastern Bonneville Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Victor to near Palisades Reservoir. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Driggs, northern Palisades Reservoir, Victor, Irwin and Pine Creek Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Palisades Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley
